abstract.t: This document defines a MIME directory profile [1] for holding a WHOIS [2] schema and is intended for communication with the Internet schema listing service. The key words 'MUST', 'MUST NOT', 'REQUIRED', 'SHALL', 'SHALL NOT', 'SHOULD', 'SHOULD NOT', 'RECOMMENDED', 'MAY', and 'OPTIONAL' in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119 [3].
